title: Type ID: Orange Peel bike sticker
content:
Good Sunday all,

Any advice on fonts similar to this bike’s Orange Peel and Fuji logos? Something close to modify would be appreciated. Thanks!

Mike

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193640im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/orangepeel_5354.jpg)

author: yipyop
